creator: belial
description:
{RHelp Topic{W: Raceedit{x <race> / <new> (newrace)

{Wraceedit new (argument):{x
     This will start a new race with the name of (agrument).

{Wraceedit (argument):{x
     This begins editing the race named (argument).

{WAvailable options while editing a race:{x
     {Bname{W:{x Sets name of race.
     {Bplayable{W:{x True or False.
     {Bsize{W:{x Tiny, small, medium, large, or huge.
     {Bundead{W:{x True or False.
     {Balignment{W:{x Set alignment of the race.
     {Bskin{W:{x Enter the different skin colors the race can have.
     {Beyes{W:{x Enter the different eye colors the race can have.
     {Bhair{W:{x Enter the different hair colors the race can have.
     {Bspeed{W:{x Sets the base speed stat of the race.
     {Bstats{W:{x Sets the base stats for the race. (Broken)
     {Bwearlocations{W:{x Sets the wear locations.
     {Bbodyparts{W:{x Sets bodyparts for race.
     {W(Type help wearloc for a list of wear locations.){x

{WWhen in the description buffer:{x
     Please type {W.h{x while in the buffer for help regarding editing.
